title: React Library
description: A powerful JavaScript library for building dynamic user interfaces with component-based architecture and virtual DOM for optimal performance.

title: Vue.js Framework
description: Progressive JavaScript framework for building modern web applications with reactive data binding and composable components.

title: Bootstrap CSS
description: The world's most popular front-end framework for responsive, mobile-first web development with extensive pre-built components.

title: Electron Apps
description: Build cross-platform desktop applications using web technologies. Create native experiences with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

title: Tailwind CSS
description: A utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom designs without leaving your HTML. Highly customizable and production-ready.

title: Animate.css
description: Just-add-water CSS animations library with smooth, attention-grabbing effects ready to use in your web projects instantly.

title: Node.js Runtime
description: JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 engine. Powers scalable network applications with event-driven, non-blocking I/O.

title: Next.js Framework
description: The React framework for production with hybrid static and server rendering, TypeScript support, and smart bundling.

title: Angular Framework
description: Platform for building mobile and desktop web applications with TypeScript. Complete solution with powerful CLI and testing tools.
